product_name: Merrell Elsand Hoodie Sweater - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With soft cotton on the outside and warm polyester on the inside, the Merrell Elsand Hoodie Sweater keeps you warm and dry while adding some class to your casual look. Polyester fabric on the inside wicks moisture to keep you dry. Cinch down the hood to seal out drafts. Includes button closures down the front and at the hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: With soft cotton on the outside and warm polyester on the inside, the Merrell Elsand Hoodie Sweater keeps you warm and dry while adding some class to your casual look.
